You feel the melody that moves the stars, channeling this cosmic beat through the power of audible rhythm and universal vibrations known by many as the Song of the Spheres. You might also simply have a melody or tune in your mind that you feel compelled to share with the wider cosmos, beginning with the allies tied to your bond.

Spellcasting Tradition primal

Harmony When you @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.y9tYChycW6xcdT7J]{Transfer Vitality}, you can extend the duration of any active epiphany from the rhythm connection by 1 round. If there are no active focus spells and you have a Focus Point remaining, you can instead cast a 1-action focus spell as part of this action.

Initial Epiphany You learn the @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.spells.Item.BKVIofy6uT5s6S9L] focus spell.

Advanced Epiphany You learn the @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.spells.Item.Mofxnqsy0x8ZKyk2] focus spell.

Greater Epiphany You learn the @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.spells.Item.cRDGqRtelPj5UTAJ] focus spell.

Perfect Harmony Whenever you Transfer Vitality, attempt to counteract any one affliction affecting your ally, or attempt to counteract an effect of your choice imposing one of these conditions: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied}. If you didn't counteract the effect, but you would have if its counteract rank were 2 lower, instead suppress the effect until the beginning of your next turn. The effect's duration doesn't elapse while it's suppressed.
